Name: The Flirt
Ingredients: 20 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lipstick on rim.
Review: A fruity sweet 'n' sour cocktail to challenge dishwashers across the land.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Dick Bradsell at Lonsdale House in Notting Hill, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of The Flirt contains 165 calories
